message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I believe this split is fair and will save us time.
Let's make it completely fair and split the amount equally. This way, we both win equally.
Bob, I appreciate the attempt at a 50/50 split, but time is valuable.  Let's settle this fairly with a slight advantage to me to account for the decreasing value.
I understand your perspective. I am willing to give you a slight edge compared to my previous offer. Let's agree on this and conclude the game before the value decreases further.
